params._token: Address of the token to fetch price for

params._isEthIndexed: Whether the price should be multiplied by ETH price
params._timeoutSeconds: Maximum age of the price feed

params._priceIndex: Index in the price array for this token

fetchPrice(address).notice: Fetches price for any token regardless of oracle type

setChainlinkOracle(address,address,uint2.notice: Sets a Chainlink oracle for a token

setSystemOracle(address,address,uint256,.notice: Sets a SystemOracle for a token
